ModMetaData.name: Misc. Objects
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** This needs Miscellaneous CORE to work without errors! ***
-Nano Storage A storage to save items for bad times -Nano Replicator Like a 3D-Printer only for much more complex items -Turret: Weapon Base You want to build your own turrets? Buy a base from a trader and add your weapon of choice to it. -Draining Pumps Slowly drains swamps and mud holes. Nothing more, nothing less. Buy it from a trader.
Special thanks to mrofa for the graphics. (Version: 0.13.1)
